tuv.seg: There is no single fixed retirement age for employees
Níl aon aois le dhul amach ar phinsean
If you are employed, your retirement age is set out in your contract of employment
Má tá tú fostaithe, tá an aois le dhul amach ar phinsean leagtha síos i do chonradh fostaíochta
Some contracts of employment have a mandatory retirement age (that is, the age at which you must retire), but they also have provisions for earlier retirement generally and/or on grounds of illness
I bhformhór conarthaí tá aois shainordaithe le dhul amach ar phinsean leagtha síos sa chonradh - ach is iondúil go mbíonn soláthar ann chun dul amach ar phinsean níos luaithe agus/nó ar bhonn tinneas
The usual retirement age in contracts of employment is 65
Sé an gnáth aois a bhíonn leagtha síos i gconradh le dhul amach ar phinsean ná 65
Many have provisions for early retirement from age 60 or in some cases from age 55 and most have provision for early retirement on health grounds

Bíonn soláthar i roinnt mhaith acu le dhul amach ar phinsean go luath ó aois 60 nó i roinnt cásanna ó aois 55 agus tá socruithe ag formhór acu i gcomhair dul ar phinsean luath mar gheall ar chúrsaí sláinte
In some cases, there is a statutory retirement age. These retirement ages arise in jobs that are established by law and the law sets out the maximum age of staff
I roinnt postanna, tá aois reachtúil ann le n-éirí as an bpost - tárlaíonn sé i bpostanna atá bunaithe ag an dlí agus leagann an dlí síos an uas-aois don fhoireann oibre
If you are self-employed, there is no set retirement age
Má tá tú féinfhostaithe, níl aon aois phinsin leagtha síos
There is no overall retirement age for company directors, but the company's articles of association may set a maximum age
Níl aon aois phinsin ginearálta ann do stiúrthóirí comhlachtaí, ach d'fhéadfadh sé go mbeadh uas-aois leagtha síos in airteagail chomhlachais an chomhlacht
The mandatory retirement age is the age at which you must retire
Sé an aois sainordaithe pinsean ná an aois ag a gcaithfidh tú eirí as an obair
It is usually set out in your contract of employment
Is iondúil go mbíonn sé leagtha síos i do chonradh
There are still some employments where the contract of employment does not include a mandatory retirement age but they are unusual
Tá roinnt postanna ann fós nach bhfuil aon aois pinsean sainordaithe sa gconradh fostaíochta, ach ní mórán acu atá ann
The retirement age in the public sector for people who joined it before 1 April 2004 is 65 years
65 an aois scoir san earnáil phoiblí dóibh sin a thosaigh ag obair roimh 1 Aibreán 2004
Some occupations - for example, the Gardai, firefighters and the Defence Forces - have provisions for much earlier retirement
Ach tá aois scoir i bhfad níos luaithe ag roinnt gairmeacha - mar shampla, na Gardaí, na múchadóirí dóiteáin agus na Fórsaí Cosanta
The minimum retirement age is 65 for people who joined the public service after 1 April 2004
Is í an aois íosta scoir 65 bliain i measc daoine a chuaigh leis an tseirbhís phoiblí i ndiaidh an 1 Aibreán 2004
For people who joined the public service after 1 January 2013 the minimum retirement age is 66 and the mandatory retirement age is 70
I dtaobh daoine a chuaigh leis an tseirbhís phoiblí i ndiaidh an 1 Eanáir 2013, is í an aois íosta scoir 66 bliain agus is í an aois éigeantach scoir 70 bliain
This means that they will not have retire at age 65 or 66 but can continue working, subject to suitability and health requirements
Ciallaíonn seo nach mbeidh orthu dul ar scor ag aois 65 nó 66 ach gur féidir leo leanúint ag oibriú, faoi réir oiriúnachta agus riachtanais sláinte
Pension benefits for new entrants to the public service will therefore accrue on a standard basis (that is, one year's credit for one year's service up to a maximum of 40 years' service)

Fabhrófar sochair phinsin d’iontrálaithe nua sa tseirbhís phoiblí, ar an ábhar sin, ar bhonn caighdeánach (is é sin, creidmheas bliain amháin do sheirbhís bliain amháin a fhad le seirbhís 40 bliain, ar a mhéid)
The minimum retirement age is 55 for people who joined the Gardai and Fire Service after 1 April 2004, while the compulsory retirement age for Gardai is 60
Is í an aois íosta scoir 55 bliain i measc daoine a chuaigh leis na Gardaí agus an tSeirbhís Dóiteáin i ndiaidh an 1 Aibreán 2004, agus is í an aois éigeantach scoir do na Gardaí 60 bliain
Equality legislation: Discrimination on the grounds of age for everyone aged over 16 is prohibited under employment equality legislation
Reachtaíocht chomhionannais: Cuirtear cosc a chur ar leatrom ar chúiseanna aoise do gach duine os cionn 16 bliana d'aois
However, employers are still allowed to set minimum recruitment ages of 18 or under and to set retirement ages in employment contracts

Is ceadmhach fós d’fhostóirí faoin reachtaíocht um chomhionannas fostaíochta, áfach, íos-aois earcaíochta de 18 bliana nó níos ísle a leagan síos agus aoiseanna scoir a leagan síos i gconarthaí fostaíochta

Since 1 January 2016, section 34 of the Employment Equality Act 1998 is amended by the Equality (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2015 to the effect that an employer may set a mandatory retirement age provided it is objectively justified

Ó 1 Eanáir 2016, faoin Alt 34 an Achta um Chomhionannas Fostaíochta 1998 arna leasú leis an Acht Chomhionannas (Forálacha Ilghnéitheacha) 2015, is féidir le fostóir aois scoir shainordaitheach a leagan síos ar an gcoinníoll go gcosnaítear é ar bhonn tosca oibiachtúla
There is a statutory, (that is, set out in legislation), retirement age for some public servants
Tá aois reachtúil, sé sin, aois atá leagtha síos ag an dlí, ann le dhul amach ar phinsean do roinnt státseirbhísigh
For people who joined the public service before 1 April 2004 this is generally 65
I dtaobh daoine a chuaigh leis an tseirbhís phoiblí roimh an 1 Aibreán 2004, is gnách gurb é 65 bliain d’aois an aois reachtúil scoir
Since 1 January 2013, the minimum retirement age for new entrants is 66 rising to 68 in 2028 in line with the State Contributory Pension
Ón 1 Eanáir 2013 i leith, is é 66 an aois íosta scoir d’iontrálaithe nua agus aois 68 a bheidh i gceist leis seo in 2028, ar aon dul leis an bPinsean Stáit (Ranníocach)
In general, self-employed people do not face age limits
Go ginearálta, níl aon chúinsí aoise ag baint do dhaoine féinfhostaithe
General practitioners must retire from the General Medical Services scheme at age 70 – this is a statutory provision
Caithfidh gnáthdhochtúirí éirí as an scéim Seirbhísí Ginearalta Leighis ag aois 70 - seo rial reachtúil
However, they may continue in private practice if they meet the fitness to practice criteria set by the Medical Council

Is féidir leo, áfach leanacht ag obair i gcleachtadh príobháideach, chomh fada is a bhfuil siad ag teacht leis an gcritéir cumas gairm dochtúireachta a chleachtadh atá leagtha síos ag an gComhairle Leighis
There is no general age limit for company directors, but sometimes the company's articles of association may specify an upper age limit
Níl aon aois pinsean ginearálta ann do stiúrthóirí comhlachtaí, ach d'fhéadfadh sé go mbeadh uas-aois leagtha síos in airteagail chomhlachais an chomhlacht
